entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
